entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind becoming south 20 km/h near noon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 8. Wind chill near minus 16. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries late in the morning and in the afternoon. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Saturday 07 January 2023
